name: VISION_COND_QUAL
description: This table holds vision condition qualifiers.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: VISION_COND_QUAL
columns.description: This item identifies the reason for the vision services when the claim contains charges for replacement frames or lenses.

columns.name: VISION_COND_CD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the condition code is related to vision services.
